lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The newspaper added that Peruvian central bank president Leonel Figueroa and the head of the central bank of Mexico, Miguel Mancera Aguayo, met in Mexico City yesterday to coordinate actions aimed at consolidating the upward trend of the price of the metal.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Analysts in Zurich, a major silver trading centre, said today the rally in silver prices was also fuelled by investors buying the metal to protect themselves against inflation, which they fear could be rekindled by the dollar's weakness.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The peruvian energy and mines minister, Wilfredo Huayta, said the government would maintain its freeze on new sales of silver until the price of the metal reaches "the true value this raw material should have."
